subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Devils’ Zach Parise entered Saturday’s game with 83 shots on goal, the most of anyone in the playoffs, but the first-year captain who becomes a free agent in July only had seven goals.
snippet: The Devils’ Zach Parise entered Saturday’s game with 83 shots on goal, the most of anyone in the playoffs, but the first-year captain who becomes a free agent in July only had seven goals.
